ci_support_linux_64_r_base4.4.yaml:
c_compiler:
- gcc
c_compiler_version:
- '14'
c_stdlib:
- sysroot
c_stdlib_version:
- '2.17'
channel_sources:
- conda-forge
channel_targets:
- conda-forge main
cran_mirror:
- https://cran.r-project.org
docker_image:
- quay.io/condaforge/linux-anvil-x86_64:alma9
libpq:
- '18'
pin_run_as_build:
  r-base:
    min_pin: x.x
    max_pin: x.x
r_base:
- '4.4'
target_platform:
- linux-64

about.summary: Database interface and 'PostgreSQL' driver for 'R'. This package provides a Database Interface 'DBI' compliant  driver for 'R' to access 'PostgreSQL' database systems.   In order to build and install this package from source, 'PostgreSQL'  itself must be present your system to provide 'PostgreSQL' functionality  via its libraries and header files. These files are provided as 'postgresql-devel' package under some Linux distributions. On 'macOS' and 'Microsoft Windows' system the attached 'libpq' library source will be used.

Database interface and 'PostgreSQL' driver for 'R'. This package provides a Database Interface 'DBI' compliant  driver for 'R' to access 'PostgreSQL' database systems.   In order to build and install this package from source, 'PostgreSQL'  itself must be present your system to provide 'PostgreSQL' functionality  via its libraries and header files. These files are provided as 'postgresql-devel' package under some Linux distributions. On 'macOS' and 'Microsoft Windows' system the attached 'libpq' library source will be used.

name: r-rpostgresql

about.summary: Database interface and 'PostgreSQL' driver for 'R'. This package provides a Database Interface 'DBI' compliant  driver for 'R' to access 'PostgreSQL' database systems.   In order to build and install this package from source, 'PostgreSQL'  itself must be present your system to provide 'PostgreSQL' functionality  via its libraries and header files. These files are provided as 'postgresql-devel' package under some Linux distributions. On 'macOS' and 'Microsoft Windows' system the attached 'libpq' library source will be used.

raw_meta_yaml:
{% set version = "0.7-7" %}
{% set posix = 'm2-' if win else '' %}

package:
  name: r-rpostgresql
  version: {{ version|replace("-", "_") }}

source:
  url:
    - {{ cran_mirror }}/src/contrib/RPostgreSQL_{{ version }}.tar.gz
    - {{ cran_mirror }}/src/contrib/Archive/RPostgreSQL/RPostgreSQL_{{ version }}.tar.gz
  sha256: f0593aa325cbabe7d7f984869e87cd86d350aeb9b9bf589191c9ebbb986c7d1c

build:
  number: 3
  rpaths:
    - lib/R/lib/
    - lib/
  missing_dso_whitelist:
    - '*/R.dll'        # [win]
    - '*/Rblas.dll'    # [win]
    - '*/Rlapack.dll'  # [win]

requirements:
  build:
    - cross-r-base {{ r_base }}    # [build_platform != target_platform]
    - {{ compiler('c') }}          # [not win]
    - {{ stdlib("c") }}            # [not win]
    - {{ compiler('m2w64_c') }}    # [win]
    - {{ stdlib("m2w64_c") }}      # [win]
    - {{ posix }}filesystem        # [win]
    - {{ posix }}sed
    - {{ posix }}grep              # [win]
    - {{ posix }}autoconf
    - {{ posix }}automake          # [not win]
    - {{ posix }}automake-wrapper  # [win]
    - pkg-config
    - {{ posix }}make
    - {{ posix }}coreutils         # [win]
    - {{ posix }}zip               # [win]
  host:
    - r-base
    - r-dbi >=0.3
    - libpq
  run:
    - r-base
    - r-dbi >=0.3

test:
  commands:
    - $R -e "library('RPostgreSQL')"           # [not win]
    - "\"%R%\" -e \"library('RPostgreSQL')\""  # [win]

about:
  home: https://github.com/tomoakin/RPostgreSQL, https://cran.r-project.org/package=DBI, http://www.postgresql.org
  license: GPL-3.0-only
  license_family: GPL3
  summary: Database interface and 'PostgreSQL' driver for 'R'. This package provides a Database Interface 'DBI' compliant  driver for 'R' to access 'PostgreSQL' database systems.   In order to build and install this package from source, 'PostgreSQL'  itself must be present your system to provide 'PostgreSQL' functionality  via
    its libraries and header files. These files are provided as 'postgresql-devel' package under some Linux distributions. On 'macOS' and 'Microsoft Windows' system the attached 'libpq' library source will be used.
  license_file:
    - {{ environ["PREFIX"] }}/lib/R/share/licenses/GPL-3

extra:
  recipe-maintainers:
    - conda-forge/r
    - mariusvniekerk

about.summary: Database interface and 'PostgreSQL' driver for 'R'. This package provides a Database Interface 'DBI' compliant  driver for 'R' to access 'PostgreSQL' database systems.   In order to build and install this package from source, 'PostgreSQL'  itself must be present your system to provide 'PostgreSQL' functionality  via its libraries and header files. These files are provided as 'postgresql-devel' package under some Linux distributions. On 'macOS' and 'Microsoft Windows' system the attached 'libpq' library source will be used.
